metadata.title: Friday, 20th March, 2015
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what the status of the new terminal building under construction at the Kenneth Kaunda International Airport is;
(b)    why the works have stalled;
(c)    whether the tender for the construction was advertised, and if so, how;
(d)    if the tender was not advertised, why;
(e)    who the contractor for the project is;
(f)    what the total cost of the project is; and
(g)    what the time-frame for completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what has necessitated the continued closure of Chilyabale Basic School in Chongwe Parliamentary Constituency since January, 2015;
(b)    when the School will re-open;
(c)    whether extra lessons will be given to the pupils at the School to make up for the lost time; and
(d)    what measures the Government has taken to ensure that a similar incident does not recur.
(a)    why the Government has banned the importation of edible oils; and
(b)    when the ban will be lifted.
(a)    whether the Government has any plans to publish the findings of the Commission of Inquiry established in 2011 to investigate the causes of riots in Mongu;
(b)    if so, when the Report will be published; and
(c)    what has caused the delay in publishing the Report.
(a)    how many former presidential pilots there were as of October, 2014;
(b)    whether the former pilots have a special status in society; and
(c)    if so, what the status is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the Government will facilitate the commissioning of a communication tower erected at Chief Chitambo’s Palace in Chitambo Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    what radius of communication network the tower is expected to cover.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when rehabilitation of the following feeder roads in Milenge District will commerce
parts: (a)    Milambo to Mulumbi;
(b)    Milambo to Lwela;
(c)    Mulumbi to Tande;
(d)    Mulumbi to Ngomba;
(e)    Chipundu to Mashika; and
(f)    Milenge to Kasepa.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to construct a weigh bridge at Luangwa Bridge in Rufunsa District;
(b)    if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c)    what the estimated cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    when the rehabilitation of the Musonweji-Mufumbwe Bridge will commence;
(b)    what the cost of the project is; and
(c)    what the time-frame for completing the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when the project to connect electricity to Milenge District from Musaila in Samfya District will commence;
(b)    how much progress has been made regarding the project, to-date;
(c)    whether the project is on schedule and, if not, why; and
(d)    when the project will be completed.
